Spring bank holiday 2016: All libraries will be closed bank holiday Monday 30 May, opening as normal on Tue 31 May. Read more.

Home → Events and activities → Children's activities

Children's activities

Most Suffolk libraries run activity sessions and events for children:

  • Baby bounce: soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies
  • Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers
  • Baby bounce and Tot Rock: songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers
  • Storytime: stories and rhymes for pre-school children
  • Family playtime: for 0-4 year olds
  • Craft activities: for primary school age children

Library activities

Library Activity Day Times
Ipswich County Library Baby bounce: soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies (term time only) Wednesday 1415-1445
Ipswich County Library Children’s craft activities Sunday 1030-1130
Ipswich County Library Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers (term time only) – drop-in Wednesday 1100-1130
Ipswich County Library Play, rhyme and storytime: activities for young children Thursday 1030-1115
Ipswich County Library Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers (term time only) – drop-in Wednesday 0945-1015
Lowestoft Library Tot time in Lowestoft Wednesday 1200-1300

Outreach activities

Outreach activities Activity Day and Time
Carlton Colville, St Peters Church Hall. Contact Lowestoft Library Tot Rock and Storytime First Monday of month 1330-1500 (term time only)
RAF Honington. Contact Thurston Library Stay and Play Wednesday 1000-1130
